title: Pixel 3XL doesn't want to update apps., or install new apps. Fromm Google Play Store. Hard reboot 6
content:
Does not want to update apps. & Install new apps. I have to clear playstore cash & hard reboot, at least 6 times for updates to happen! (I have it set to auto-update.. won't do that either)!!
I installed the latest system update, early Feb. No error codes on above, either. Bought in late November.
WHAT COULD BE WRONG??
